entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed upon the entity trying to fly an Elytra/power that uses the [Elytra Flight (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_elytra_flight).
entity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed upon the entity trying to fly an Elytra/power that uses the [Elytra Flight (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_elytra_flight).

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_elytra_flight)

Prevents the entity that has the power from flying with either an Elytra item or a power that uses the [Elytra Flight (Power Type)](elytra_flight.md).

Type ID: `origins:prevent_elytra_flight`
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_elytra_flight)

Prevents the entity that has the power from flying with either an Elytra item or a power that uses the [Elytra Flight (Power Type)](elytra_flight.md).

Type ID: `origins:prevent_elytra_flight`
